_header: The better that thy state be
_description: Advice on the need for wisdom when one is of high estate — one couplet

BodDou52.Transcription: The better that thi state bethe better wysdom be houys the
BodDou52.Editions:
Förster,  Max. 
             “Die Mittelenglische Sprichwörtersammlung in Douce 52.” 
             Festschrift zum XII Deutschen Neuphilolgentage in München
                1906.
            E. Stollreither, ed. 
         Erlangen (1906): 40-64: 56.
